title: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view
description: Description: When attempting to select an item for the first time in the library outline view, it is not possible. Instead, the focus jumps to the library file node in the outline view.
OB: When trying to select an item in the library outline view for the first time, it is not possible. The focus immediately jumps to the library file node in the outline view.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the library outline view
2. Try to select any item in the view for the first time
